message: Successfully migrated phases.py to use SQLite state_db with JSON fallback

changes: Migrated get_phases() endpoint (line 54-78) to use state_db.load_task_snapshot
Migrated get_current_phase() endpoint (line 81-161) to use state_db.load_task_snapshot and state_db.get_phase_agent_counts
Preserved JSON fallback for backwards compatibility
data.pattern_used: SQLite first, then fallback to JSON
